video_title: How Caffeine Helps People With ADHD
transcript:
why does tea or coffee calm me down
emotionally when I have ADHD this is
super cool so you look at ADHD their
minds are moving too fast I get
distracted I'm thinking about this I'm
thinking about this I'm hyperactive I'm
fidgeting
you know and what is the medication that
we tend to give people who are who have
ADHD stimulants wait but if they're
moving too fast why am I stimulating
them or more importantly what part of
the brain am I stimulating what I'm
stimulating with people with ADHD is the
brakes I'm hyper activating the part of

helps people with ADHD calm down it
hyper activates your frontal lobes which
then control or suppress your emotional
circuitry so it's kind of weird but we
actually want to hyperactivate people
with ADHD not slow them down I'm going
to strengthen the brakes
